translations.translation: Nor shade and heat of sunshine.
nor cool shade and torrid heat;
And neither are the shadow and the hot sunshine!
Nor are the shade and the sun's heat.
Nor the shade and the heat,
the shade and the torrid heat;
Nor is the shadow equal with the sun's full heat;
shade and heat are not alike,
- Nor the shade and the sun's heat.
Nor are the (chilly) shade and the (genial) heat of the sun:
Nor are (alike) the shade and the sun's heat.
The shade and the hot wind are not equal,
Nor are the shade and the torrid heat.
Nor are the shade and the heat,
[35:21] nor shade and torrid heat, namely, Paradise and the Fire;
492 (Nor is the shadow equal with the sun's full heat) nor is Paradise equal to the Fire;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَلاَ ٱلظِّلُّ } الإلهي، والمروح لأرواح أرباب المحبة والولاء بنفحات نسائم أنواع الفتوحات والكرامات { وَلاَ ٱلْحَرُورُ } [فاطر: 21] أي: السموم المهلكة المنشأة من فوحان الأماني الإمكانية، الممتزجة بيحموم الطبيعة المتصاعدة من أبخرة الأهوية ونيران الشهوات
